title: Anton Rozdorozhniuk CV
name: Anton Rozdorozhniuk
profileText:
I'm experienced mobile developer with good knowledge in backend development, adept in all stages of advanced web and mobile development.

I'm knowledgeable in user interface, design, testing, and debugging processes. I have great expertise in design, deploying, testing and maintenance of mobile applications and web systems. Equipped with a diverse and promising skill-set. 

I'm proficient in an assortment of technologies, including Java, Spring, kotiln and Flutter. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate in a team setting.

educationList.title: Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng.), Vinnytsia National Technical University
Master of Computer Applications (M.C.A.), Vinnytsia National Technical University

projects.name: Ride Genie (Taxi app)
projects.description: Ride Genie is the Easiest, Most Convenient Way To Get a Ride in Las Vegas. Simply Choose Your Ride Between Cabs or Black Cars. Like UBER, but Better!

projects.name: "PartyPoker" Game App
projects.description: PartyPoker is an online poker card room. Launched in 2001 by PartyGaming, the site has had up to 80,000 players logged-in and was the largest online card room until 2006.

projects.name: Virgin Bet: Sports Betting on Football & Racing
projects.description: Virgin Bet is a brand new sportsbook launched by Gamseys and powered by the popular SBTech gaming platform software providers.
